name: magefan/module-blog
description: Implements Blog functionality on Magento 2 store

suggest.magefan/module-blog-comments-recaptcha: Install this module to activate ReCaptcha on blog comments form to protect against spam.
suggest.magefan/module-blog-graph-ql: Install this module to activate GraphQl integration for the blog.
suggest.magefan/module-blog-amp: Install this module to activate Blog integration with the Plumrocket AMP extension.
